text: @realmney Its The Business I Have Chosen I was a large buyer of stocks during the last half of December. On the market's extraordinary strength since Christmas I have made a number of portfolio changes this week: * Eliminated longs in $MMM $AMZN $GOOGL

* Reduced long holdings in Square, CBS * Initiated longs in MJ and CGC * Established a Spyder short (progressively as the market rose and more meaningfully over the last two days) Net, net I have moved from a large net long exposure to a short exposure.

I have been an active and anticipatory trader over the last few months (while maintaining long term investment positions) and I dont see anything that will change my strategy of dealing with the regime of volatility that began a year ago. I have not and dont plan to be

reactive in my trading - because in a trading market (with a broad range) there does not appear to be a primary trend to capitalize on, just opportunities to trade against machines, algos and extreme moves in investor sentiment. This approach is not for everyone -

nor does it mean more patient strategies will not be rewarding. But this approach is serving me well (so I will continue to throw the dice), is consistent with my risk appetite and is the business I have chosen piped.video/watch?v=WgN2rROp… . (Which means I am about to implode!)

I anticipate the trading range, as most are aware, will ultimately be broken to the downside in response to a sharp deceleration in the rate of global growth and a meaingful miss to corporate profits. "There's $2 million in a bag in your room. I am going in to take a nap.

When I wake the money's on the table, I know I have a partner. If it isnt I know I don't." - Hyman Roth, The Godfather I end the day net short, with a growing conviction level. realmoney.thestreet.com/doug… Long SQ CBS CGC MJ Short SPY large
Moved from large to medium sized $SQ (+35% in last week) @realmoney @jimcramer
$SQ has moved from $50 to $67 in the last week. Booyah! !! @realmoney @jimcramer I still believe it makes sense for $GOOGL to buy $SQ

* Getting little giving too much on my Twitter thread this week, to be honest. * Getting bored with Twitter trolls and their hate. * Anyway I have three separate research meetings with companies so I will be busy. Taking off rest of week from $TWTR. Good luck trading/investing.
